adversarial_findings.summary: artifact_index stale hash for day_validator_report.json due post-index validator write.
adversarial_findings.risk: Forensic reproducibility breaks when index hashes diverge from bytes.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Prevent mutable validator output from invalidating indexed bytes; enforce canonical-primary index coverage.

adversarial_findings.summary: Canonical primary outputs were not all represented in artifact_index.
adversarial_findings.risk: Primary governance artifacts can bypass hash-level integrity checks.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Require artifact_index coverage for canonical primary outputs.

adversarial_findings.summary: Blockers were marked closed without a post-remediation adversarial artifact proving closure.
adversarial_findings.risk: Governance state can overstate remediation completion.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Use re-attributed/open status until closure is validated by a subsequent adversarial review artifact.

adversarial_findings.summary: Batch filename range and referenced IDs diverged after row substitution.
adversarial_findings.risk: Lineage ambiguity and confusion in downstream audits.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Rename artifacts to non-range rowset IDs or keep strict filename-to-row-range consistency.

adversarial_findings.summary: Some witness text contained commentary-like placeholders rather than direct source snippets.
adversarial_findings.risk: Training-signal quality degrades when witness fields contain non-source prose.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Constrain witness fields to source snippets only and remove placeholders/comments.

adversarial_findings.summary: Retrospective content was stale relative to active gate and red-team status.
adversarial_findings.risk: Operational narrative can mislead readers about current gate state.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Synchronize retrospective with the latest gate/red-team status after each remediation round.

verified: Second adversarial review validated prior remediations and identified residual governance gaps requiring another hardening pass.
